title: 袁國勇：香港每日有140個老人死，接種科興後死，未必同疫苗有關

replies.msg:
https://www.facebook.com/FrontlineTechWorkersConcernGroup/posts/4012735805432789

作者：前線科技人員

袁國勇醫生表示，香港每日有140個老人家死，好多都有長期病患，所以再有人接種科興疫苗之後死亡，未必一定同疫苗有直接關係。

同日袁國勇醫生接種輝瑞 BioNTech 疫苗
佢計埋仆街死個d廢老？
55歲都係老人家？？？？？
咁其實佢邏輯上冇錯
睇吓要死幾多人先肯停打
連登仔：香港每日有140個老人死，感染武肺後死，未必同武肺有關

quote.msg: 佢計埋仆街死個d廢老？

replies.msg: 徒步橫跨龍翔道果 d

但係開始打無幾日就出事
唔暫停接種同研究死因就一口咬定唔關疫苗事

d人散播恐懼者

佢打果知同柒婆打果知一樣

計返正常老人死嘅比率

再計返幾多老人打左科興，然後死左嘅比率

咁先驗證得到科興令到老人早左死呢個假設成唔成立

現實係大陸都無叫60歳以上去打，你班所謂專家就衝出黎叫60歲以上都可以打，出左事班專家責無旁貸。

你梗係講無野啦

屌，姐係要死多啲人先可以正式話關事啊
咪由鳩啲藍絲呀叔打囉
所以大家記得關心屋企既老人家唔好接種，係一次智力大清洗
日日都有人死唔見你死？
火上加油

quote.msg:
咁係咪要計全香港有幾多老人
計返正常老人死嘅比率

再計返幾多老人打左科興，然後死左嘅比率

replies.msg:
試下計，無讀過stat

60歲以上人口202萬

科興13日打了62000人
https://www.info.gov.hk/gia/general/202103/04/P2021030400748.htm

科興13日死亡率2/62000=0.0032%

正常60歲以上人口13日死亡率

140*13/2020000 =0.09%


我覺得咁計有啲問題，有無巴打可以改改

quote.msg: 想問有無SOURCE？？？？？

60歲以上人口202萬

科興13日打了62000人
https://www.info.gov.hk/gia/general/202103/04/P2021030400748.htm

科興13日死亡率2/62000=0.0032%

replies.msg:
你咁計梗係有問題
科興個sample 都唔係random ，
唔通末期病人等死都打科興咩。

同埋如果機率極細，例如十萬份之一，你都唔會係統計上見到，除非講phrase 4幾千萬人接種。

quote.msg: 咁其實佢邏輯上冇錯

replies.msg:
From https://www.chp.gov.hk/en/static/80010.html


Age group 55-64, during 2018 (365 days), ~600 men out of 100000 and 300 women out of 100000 die. Say, average 450 out of 100000 die in 365 days.

if 60000 took the vaccine in 13 days, on average even without the vaccine, we expect (60000/100000) * 450 * (13 / 365) = 9.6 deaths.

Caveat: sample of who die is not random, and sample who took the vaccine not random.

Professor Yuen has a point (2 deaths of this age is not too many). I don't think he will push HK people to die.

Similarly, once in a while, someone dies running marathons. We talk about 40000-80000 for 4-6 hours. Even without the running some people may die.

The real problem with the chinese vaccine is the 50% (low) efficacy. Let the blue corpses take them. We smart yellow silk take Pfizer. Professor Yuen gave everyone a hint.

From https://www.chp.gov.hk/en/static/80010.html


Age group 55-64, during 2018 (365 days), ~600 men out of 100000 and 300 women out of 100000 die. Say, average 450 out of 100000 die in 365 days.

if 60000 took the vaccine in 13 days, on average even without the vaccine, we expect (60000/100000) * 450 * (13 / 365) = 9.6 deaths.

Caveat: sample of who die is not random, and sample who took the vaccine not random.

Professor Yuen has a point (2 deaths of this age is not too many). I don't think he will push HK people to die.

Similarly, once in a while, someone dies running marathons. We talk about 40000-80000 for 4-6 hours. Even without the running some people may die.

The real problem with the chinese vaccine is the 50% (low) efficacy. Let the blue corpses take them. We smart yellow silk take Pfizer. Professor Yuen gave everyone a hint.

replies.msg:
Ah, if people die uniformly random during those 13 days, half woul dhave died and not have taken the vaccine. So, average should be 4.8.

If 90% of all deaths happen after at least 7 days in the hospital, then we expect fewer people (10% of the total) to suddenly die. Meanwhile I know people in mid 50s die of heart disease and stroke etc suddenly (growing up in public housing, poor people die young suddenly more often).
